# Read source files


```{r prepare_basin_mask}

# use only three basin to assign general basin mask
# ie this is not specific to the MLR fitting
basinmask <- basinmask %>% 
  filter(MLR_basins == "2") %>% 
  select(lat, lon, basin_AIP)


```



```{r read_OceanSODA}

OceanSODA <-
  tidync(paste(
    path_OceanSODA,
    "OceanSODA-ETHZ_1985-2019_v2020b.nc",
    sep = ""
  ))

OceanSODA <- OceanSODA %>% hyper_tibble()

OceanSODA <- OceanSODA %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(time, origin = '1985-01-01'),
         year = year(date))

OceanSODA <- OceanSODA %>%
  select(year, date, lat, lon, salinity, temperature, DIC, TA, revelle_factor, pCO2)

OceanSODA <- OceanSODA %>%
  mutate(lon = if_else(lon < 20, lon + 360, lon))

OceanSODA <- inner_join(OceanSODA, basinmask)

```

# Revelle factor

```{r rev_fac}

rev_fac <- OceanSODA %>%
  select(year, lat, lon, rev_fac = revelle_factor) %>%
  group_by(year, lat, lon) %>%
  summarise(rev_fac = mean(rev_fac, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  mutate(
    grid_area = earth_surf(lat = lat),
    rev_fac_area = rev_fac * grid_area,
    lat_bands = cut(lat, seq(-80, 80, 20)),
    decade = cut(year,
                 seq(1990, 2020, 10),
                 right = FALSE,
                 labels = c("1990-1999", "2000-2009", "2010-2019"))
  ) %>%
  drop_na()

map +
  geom_raster(data = rev_fac %>%
                filter(year == 2010), aes(lon, lat, fill = rev_fac)) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c() +
  labs(title = "Year: 2010")

map +
  geom_raster(data = rev_fac %>%
                filter(year == 2010), aes(lon, lat, fill = grid_area)) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c() +
  labs(title = "Year: 2010")


rev_fac_ave_lat <- rev_fac %>% 
  group_by(year, lat_bands, decade) %>% 
  summarise(area_total = sum(grid_area),
            rev_fac_area_total = sum(rev_fac_area),
            rev_fac = rev_fac_area_total / area_total) %>% 
  ungroup()

rev_fac_ave_lat %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, rev_fac, col = lat_bands)) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Spectral") +
  geom_path() +
  geom_point()

rev_fac_ave_lat %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, rev_fac, col = decade)) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~lat_bands)

# decadal trends per latitude band

rev_fac_ave_lat_trend <- rev_fac_ave_lat %>% 
  nest(data = -c(decade, lat_bands)) %>% 
  mutate(tidy = map(data, ~broom::tidy(lm(rev_fac ~ year, data = .x)))) %>% 
  select(-data) %>% 
  unnest(tidy)


rev_fac_ave_lat_trend %>% 
  filter(term == "year") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(decade, estimate, fill = lat_bands)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Spectral") +
  geom_point(shape=21) +
  geom_path()

rev_fac_ave <- rev_fac %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(area_total = sum(grid_area),
            rev_fac_area_total = sum(rev_fac_area),
            rev_fac = rev_fac_area_total / area_total) %>% 
  ungroup()

rev_fac_ave %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, rev_fac)) +
  scale_color_scico_d(palette = "berlin") +
  geom_path() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")


```
